title: COMPLETE 3-MONTH PROGRAM
description: A comprehensive 12-week program covering Communication & Confidence, Career Growth & Workplace Intelligence, and Personality, EQ, Leadership & AI Mastery.

title: Month 1 - Communication & Confidence
description: Master fluency, business English, pronunciation, and presentation skills with daily practice and personalized feedback.

title: Month 2 - Career Growth & Workplace Skills
description: Dominate interviews, build your professional brand, and develop workplace intelligence and leadership basics.

title: Month 3 - Personality, EQ, Leadership & AI
description: Upgrade your personality, develop emotional intelligence, critical thinking, and master AI for communication and career.

title: Corporate Soft Skills Training
description: Customized programs for teams to enhance workplace communication and collaboration.
